Sure, here are some last-minute tips to help you relax and stay calm during the skills test:

1. Get enough sleep: Ensure you get a good night's rest before the day of the test. Being well-rested will help you to be more alert and focused during the test.

2. Arrive early: Get to the test location early so that you are not rushing, which can increase nervousness.

3. Take deep breaths: If you start feeling nervous, try taking deep breaths to calm your nerves. Close your eyes and take three slow, deep breaths.

4. Visualize success: Visualize yourself performing well and succeeding in the test. Focus on positive thoughts and visualize yourself taking the test with confidence and skill.

5. Stay positive: Don't dwell on negative thoughts or worry about how you'll perform. Instead, focus on the task ahead and believe in yourself.

6. Remember to have fun: Finally, remember that the skills test is an opportunity to showcase your skills and become a commercial driver. Try to enjoy the experience, relax and do your best.
